alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Madison; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 12:53PM CDT until March 31 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LUCAS...NORTHWESTERN DECATUR...SOUTHEASTERN MADISON...CLARKE AND SOUTHERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 1252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Osceola, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Otter Creek County Park, Lake Ahquabi State Park and Indianola. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 23 and 52. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
